items.title: US launches phase two of Gaza peace plan with new technocratic government
items.description: It includes the establishment of a technocratic Palestinian government, as well as the reconstruction and demilitarisation of Gaza, US envoy Steve Wit...

items.title: Mahmood has no confidence in police chief after Israeli fan ban
items.description: West Midlands Police apologises for errors, but makes no comment on its chief constable's future.

items.title: California investigates Grok over AI deepfakes
items.description: The state attorney general urges xAI to take action over the "shocking" material as Musk denies the allegations.

items.title: White House defends Trump over middle-finger gesture at heckler
items.description: Thousands of people have sent donations totalling nearly $700,000 (Â£521,000) to the heckler, who was suspended from his job at Ford.

items.title: Why banning of Maccabi fans raises questions about police integrity
items.description: The decision to ban fans of the Israeli team from a UK game was based on a flawed assessment, a report has found.
